name: AdvancementManagerHelper
description: The AdvancementManagerHelper class is a World Interaction helper in JSMacros that provides access to Minecraft's advancement system.
overview: It allows you to query, analyze, and manage advancements for the current player, including their progress, completion status, and relationships between different advancements. This class is particularly useful for creating scripts that track player advancement progress, create custom advancement-based triggers, analyze completed and missing advancements, or build advancement statistics or dashboards.

methods.name: getAdvancementsForIdentifiers
methods.description: Returns a map containing all advancement IDs mapped to their corresponding AdvancementHelper objects. The keys are the full advancement identifiers.

methods.name: getAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of all available advancements as AdvancementHelper objects.

methods.name: getStartedAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of started advancements - these are advancements where at least one task/criteria has been completed, but the advancement is not fully completed yet.

methods.name: getMissingAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of advancements that the player has not started or completed at all.

methods.name: getCompletedAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of all fully completed advancements.

methods.name: getRootAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of all root advancements. Root advancements are the starting points of advancement trees.

methods.name: getSubAdvancements
methods.description: Returns a list of all advancements that are not root advancements - essentially all child advancements in the advancement trees.

methods.name: getAdvancement
methods.description: Returns a specific advancement by its identifier.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The advancement identifier. Can omit the namespace if using 'minecraft'.

methods.name: getAdvancementsProgress
methods.description: Returns a map containing all advancements mapped to their current progress information for the player.

methods.name: getAdvancementProgress
methods.description: Returns the progress information for a specific advancement.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The advancement identifier. Can omit the namespace if using 'minecraft'.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation showing the count of started, missing, and completed advancements.
